attributes.action: Better infrastructure before more building of houses/flats in Tiptree Essex.
attributes.background: Tiptree was a small village in Essex before they started carving up the land for the building of houses/flats, we do not have the roads or amenities to handle all the new houses/flats that are being built. The small medical centre we have can not cope as it is

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.
	
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
